DESCRIPTION: Persona are 0 cost Skill cards that change the active Arcana and grant special passive effects when played and draw a card when drawn. You can only have one Persona at a time.
Arcana are cards that transform into different cards depending on the active Arcana.
The Priestess demands sacrifice, Exhausting cards in exchange for healing and Weakening the enemy.
The Emperor stands strong, Blocking the enemy's advance and retaliating in kind while warding off any sort of trickery.
The Fool is a jack of all trades, boasting card draw and a wide variety of other effects.
Judgement brings divine wrath down upon the enemy, using mighty Strength to cleave swathes of enemies at once.
Death's very presence makes enemies more Vulnerable to attack, wakening a primal Energy to destroy any foe in one fell swoop.
Deck refers to the hand, draw pile, and discard pile.
